title: Electrochemical-catalytic NH3 synthesis from H2O and N2 using an electrochemical cell with a Ru catalyst, Pd-Ag membrane cathode, and NaOH-KOH molten salt electrolyte at 250°C
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00218K, Communication

Using sustainable energy-based electricity to synthesize NH3 from H2O and N2 to release O2 not only contributes to making the chemical fertilizer production carbon neutral, but also holds promise for...
